\n\tTravel Shampoo.productDescription:
Make your shower feel like a spa, no matter where you are. Our shampoo’s organic, vegan ingredients will gently bring your hair back to life and restore manageability, adding sheen and softness. These can be refilled with our 16oz products, eliminating the need for little plastic bottles.
Includes 2.5 oz of shampoo in reusable aluminum bottle. This shampoo is vegan, hypoallergenic, baby safe (no tears), color safe, biodegradable and cruelty free, no animal testing. Perfect for all hair types, especially for those with sensitive skin or scalp. No harmful chemicals (no PEG, PG, parabens, sulfates, dyes, synthetic fragrances or petrochemicals).

\n\tTravel Conditioner.productDescription:
No more need for those little plastic conditioner bottles. Now you can take Plaine Product’s conditioner along for the ride and keep your hair looking silky and smooth. When you get home you can refill this bottle with your regular size conditioner!
Includes 2.5 oz of conditioner in reusable aluminum bottle. This conditioner is vegan, hypoallergenic, baby safe (no tears), color safe, biodegradable and cruelty free, no animal testing. Perfect for all hair types, especially for those with sensitive skin or scalp. No harmful chemicals (no PEG, PG, parabens, sulfates, dyes, synthetic fragrances or petrochemicals).

\n\tTravel Body Lotion.productDescription:
Say goodbye to plastic travel body lotion bottles! Take that spa scent with you and enjoy Plaine Products on the road. When you get home you can refill with your regular sized bottle. We make it easy to do good.
Contains 2.7 oz of body lotion in reusable aluminum bottle. The body lotion is vegan, hypoallergenic, baby safe, color safe and cruelty free, no animal testing. Its perfect for all skin types, especially great for anyone with sensitive skin. No harmful chemicals (no PEG, PG, parabens, sulfates, dyes, synthetic fragrances or petrochemicals).

\n\tTravel Body Wash.productDescription:

\n\tTravel Shampoo & Conditioner.productDescription:
Make your shower feel like a spa, no matter where you are. Our shampoo and conditioner’s natural ingredients restore essential nutrients to enhance your hair’s texture making it luminous, silky and smooth. They work together to nourish your hair, making this combo a choice that’s good for you and the planet. These can be refilled with our 16oz products, eliminating the need for little plastic bottles.
Includes 2.5 oz of shampoo and conditioner in reusable aluminum bottles. This shampoo and conditioner are vegan, hypoallergenic, baby safe (no tears), color safe, biodegradable and cruelty free, no animal testing. Perfect for all hair types, especially for those with sensitive skin or scalp. No harmful chemicals (no PEG, PG, parabens, sulfates, dyes, synthetic fragrances or petrochemicals).

\n\tTravel Size 3 Pack.productDescription:
No more need for those little plastic bottles. Our shampoo & conditioner’s natural ingredients restore essential nutrients to enhance your hair’s texture making it luminous, silky and smooth. The body wash is blended with the finest natural and organic ingredients to gently clean while restoring nutrients and powerful antioxidants to your skin. Daily use improves skin’s tone and texture. Together these three products will make your shower feel like a day at the spa.
When you get home you can refill this bottles with your regular size products!
Includes 2.5 oz aluminum bottles of shampoo, conditioner and body wash. These products are vegan, hypoallergenic, baby safe (no tears), color safe, biodegradable and cruelty free, no animal testing. Perfect for all hair and skin types, especially for those with sensitive skin or scalp. No harmful chemicals (no PEG, PG, parabens, sulfates, dyes, synthetic fragrances or petrochemicals).

\n\tBody Lotion Subscription.productDescription:
Soothe your skin every day with our hydrating rosemary, mint, vanilla lotion. A rich blend of pure aloe and rose hips oil makes this lotion an extraordinary skin conditioner. Daily use will improve skin’s texture and appearance.
Includes 16 oz aluminum bottle of lotion. This lotion is vegan, hypoallergenic, baby safe, color safe and cruelty free, no animal testing. It’s perfect for all skin types, especially great for anyone with sensitive skin. No harmful chemicals (no PEG, PG, parabens, sulfates, dyes, synthetic fragrances or petrochemicals).

\n\tShampoo.productDescription:
Make your shower feel like a spa. We’ve combined the healing properties of rosemary with a fresh minty scent and a hint of vanilla to comfort and calm your senses. Our shampoo’s organic ingredients work together to bring your hair back to life and restore manageability, adding sheen and softness. It’s a choice that’s good for you and the planet.
Hypoallergenic. Baby safe. Color Safe. Biodegradable. Cruelty Free, no animal testing. Perfect for all hair types, especially for those with sensitive skin or scalp. No harmful chemicals (no PEG, PG, parabens, sulfates, dyes, synthetic fragrances or petrochemicals).

Daily use improves skin’s tone and texture. Our shampoo and body wash will nourish your hair and skin, making you feel like you’ve spent the day at the spa.
Thanks! Your purchase means great products for you and less plastic in the world!
